name: Ace Solitaire Card 18
description:
Ace Solitaire Card 18 is also known as Klondike Solitaire and Patience, and it is the most popular solitaire card game in the world.It has beautiful graphics, and if you like Solitaire, you’re going to love this game!
Features:

· Daily Challenges
· Beautiful graphics
· Klondike
· All Winning deals
· Timer mode
